Intel's shares experienced a 5% drop in premarket trading following Trump's statement.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/intel-ceo-should-resign-immediately-no-other-solution-as-he-is-highly-says-donald-trump/articleshow/123167909.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/intel-ceo-should-resign-immediately-no-other-solution-as-he-is-highly-says-donald-trump/articleshow/123167909.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 18:49:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="94938" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123167901,imgsize-94938.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump urges Middle East peace via Abraham Accords, says Iran nukes ‘gone’</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump has urged all Middle Eastern nations to join the Abraham Accords, emphasizing its importance for regional peace. The call comes amid ongoing tensions and efforts to foster dialogue in the Middle East.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/peace-in-middle-east-donald-trump-pushes-abraham-accords-says-irans-nuke-arsenal-obliterated/articleshow/123166534.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/peace-in-middle-east-donald-trump-pushes-abraham-accords-says-irans-nuke-arsenal-obliterated/articleshow/123166534.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 17:41:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="986531" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123166690,imgsize-986531.cms"/></item><item><title>EU sanctions hit Nayara logistics as shipping lines pull back; seeks government help</title><description><![CDATA[Nayara Energy faces severe fuel supply disruptions as shipowners halt operations due to EU sanctions linked to its Russian ownership. Hooda challenged the government to acknowledge the problems and take corrective action.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sink-city-koodagram-hooda-takes-shot-at-bjp-govt-over-gurugrams-urban-woes/articleshow/123167726.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sink-city-koodagram-hooda-takes-shot-at-bjp-govt-over-gurugrams-urban-woes/articleshow/123167726.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 18:42:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="948148" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123167795,imgsize-948148.cms"/></item><item><title>Google CEO Sundar Pichai to youngsters: I believe that best employees are...</title><description><![CDATA[Google CEO Sundar Pichai, now a billionaire, emphasizes the importance of self-criticism and embracing discomfort for professional growth. Pichai's management philosophy centers on building mission-oriented teams driven by a shared pursuit of excellence, fostering an environment of trust and commitment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-to-youngsters-i-believe-that-best-employees-are-/articleshow/123166389.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-to-youngsters-i-believe-that-best-employees-are-/articleshow/123166389.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 17:24:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23410" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123166379,imgsize-23410.cms"/></item><item><title>'Certain conditions': Putin explains why he won't meet Zelenskyy</title><description><![CDATA[Vladimir Putin stated that the conditions for direct talks with Volodymyr Zelenskyy are not yet in place, despite Zelenskyy's willingness. Meanwhile, Putin is expected to visit India by the end of 2025 and may meet with Donald Trump in the UAE next week.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/certain-conditions-putin-explains-why-he-wont-meet-zelenskyy-says-he-has-nothing-against-ukraine-president/articleshow/123167389.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/certain-conditions-putin-explains-why-he-wont-meet-zelenskyy-says-he-has-nothing-against-ukraine-president/articleshow/123167389.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 18:20:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="987320" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123167427,imgsize-987320.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Will our citizenship be taken?’: Mamata attacks Centre; BJP hits back</title><description><![CDATA[West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee accused the BJP-led central government of plotting to deprive citizens of their rights by revising the voter list, alleging a scheme to label Indians as Rohingyas and deport them. Gray, with the team since 2021, is showing promise, building on a strong 2024 season.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-final-countdown-begins-after-andy-reid-picks-noah-gray-to-carry-tight-end-legacy/articleshow/123127693.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-final-countdown-begins-after-andy-reid-picks-noah-gray-to-carry-tight-end-legacy/articleshow/123127693.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 03:04:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="58908" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123127690,imgsize-58908.cms"/></item><item><title>Jaz Agassi’s sweet support for dad Andre Agassi — Steffi Graf moment resurfaces</title><description><![CDATA[Andre Agassi addressed Shore Capital Partner’s Leadership Academy in New York City on July 14, 2025, emphasizing leadership, mindset, and purpose. Following the fireside chat with Jish Bia, Agassi's daughter, Jaz, expressed her admiration on Instagram. Agassi has previously discussed parenting and his efforts to break negative cycles, highlighting his and Steffi Graf's influence on their children.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/andre-agassi-and-steffi-grafs-daughter-jaz-shows-sweet-support-for-dads-thoughtful-leadership-speech/articleshow/123152346.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/andre-agassi-and-steffi-grafs-daughter-jaz-shows-sweet-support-for-dads-thoughtful-leadership-speech/articleshow/123152346.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 05:24:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1061307" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123152326,imgsize-1061307.cms"/></item><item><title>Earthquake risk in Canada! Yukon fault shows signs of awakening after 12,000 years</title><description><![CDATA[A recent study confirms that Canada's Tintina fault, stretching across Yukon, is an active seismic hazard, challenging previous assumptions. Scientists warn that the fault is overdue for a major earthquake, potentially magnitude 7.5 or greater. The discovery prompts urgent updates to Canada's National Seismic Hazard Model, impacting building codes and emergency preparedness.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/earthquake-risk-in-canada-yukon-fault-shows-signs-of-awakening-after-12000-years-threatening-thousands/articleshow/123166971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/earthquake-risk-in-canada-yukon-fault-shows-signs-of-awakening-after-12000-years-threatening-thousands/articleshow/123166971.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 18:13:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="181558" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123167238,imgsize-181558.cms"/></item><item><title>VP elections: PM Modi, Nadda to pick candidate; NDA leaders hold key huddle</title><description><![CDATA[Following Jagdeep Dhankhar's resignation, the NDA convened a crucial strategy meeting on Wednesday to deliberate on the upcoming Vice-Presidential election. Authorizing Prime Minister Modi and BJP president Nadda to finalize their candidate, the alliance unanimously passed a resolution. Kiren Rijiju announced the election timeline, setting August 21 as the nomination deadline and September 9 for polling and counting.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vp-elections-pm-modi-bjp-chief-jp-nadda-to-pick-candidate-nda-leaders-hold-key-huddle/articleshow/123166073.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vp-elections-pm-modi-bjp-chief-jp-nadda-to-pick-candidate-nda-leaders-hold-key-huddle/articleshow/123166073.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 17:09:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1065450" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123166133,imgsize-1065450.cms"/></item><item><title>5 India stars of Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy who could miss the Asia Cup</title><description><![CDATA[Despite India's Test dominance against England, several key players from the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy are set to miss the Asia Cup. Jasprit Bumrah is rested due to workload, while KL Rahul is overlooked despite a strong IPL. Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill are committed to the Duleep Trophy, and Rishabh Pant is injured and out of contention.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/5-india-stars-of-anderson-tendulkar-trophy-who-could-miss-the-asia-cup-2025/articleshow/123165051.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/5-india-stars-of-anderson-tendulkar-trophy-who-could-miss-the-asia-cup-2025/articleshow/123165051.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:39:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1456334" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123165324,imgsize-1456334.cms"/></item><item><title>CBSE launches new career dashboard and counseling hub </title><description><![CDATA[The Central Board of Secondary Education introduces two initiatives for the 2025-26 session. These are the Career Guidance Dashboard and the Counseling Hub and Spoke School Model. The Career Guidance Dashboard offers career information and exploration tools. The Counseling Hub and Spoke Model aims to support students' emotional and mental health. These programs will evolve with stakeholder input.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/inside-cbses-new-career-dashboard-and-counseling-hub-how-it-will-support-students-teachers-and-parents/articleshow/123165971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/inside-cbses-new-career-dashboard-and-counseling-hub-how-it-will-support-students-teachers-and-parents/articleshow/123165971.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 17:01:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="47836" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123165959,imgsize-47836.cms"/></item><item><title>NCERT forms expert panel to review Class 8 map after feedback on Maratha Empire depiction</title><description><![CDATA[NCERT has formed an expert committee to review textbook content following concerns about a Class 8 social science textbook. The dispute arose from a map depicting parts of Rajasthan under the Maratha Empire, which was contested by historians. NCERT emphasizes that the review aligns with the National Education Policy 2020, ensuring academic integrity and transparency through evidence-based decisions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/ncert-forms-expert-panel-to-review-class-8-map-after-feedback-on-maratha-empire-depiction/articleshow/123164616.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/ncert-forms-expert-panel-to-review-class-8-map-after-feedback-on-maratha-empire-depiction/articleshow/123164616.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:05:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="99370" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123164654,imgsize-99370.cms"/></item><item><title>Explainer: Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs - will India budge on Russia crude oil trade?</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's doubled tariffs on India, targeting its Russian oil trade, aim to pressure Putin on the Ukraine war. India faces a complex balancing act between maintaining ties with Russia and the US, its largest trading partner. While India may gradually reduce Russian oil dependency, a complete shift is unlikely due to economic and political considerations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/explainer-donald-trumps-50-tariffs-will-india-budge-on-russia-crude-oil-trade/articleshow/123164854.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/explainer-donald-trumps-50-tariffs-will-india-budge-on-russia-crude-oil-trade/articleshow/123164854.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:27:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57020" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123165029,imgsize-57020.cms"/></item><item><title>Chess | The Mother’s Gambit: How one trick raised a champion at 8</title><description><![CDATA[Tanishka Garg, an eight-year-old from Bathinda, has become Punjab's youngest female FIDE-rated chess player, showcasing her strategic talent at a young age. Players are met with a mechanical insectoid invasion led by Daigo's Kraken and a road that brings other Fortnite game mechanics like Mighty Morphin Power Rangers to life!]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/esports/fortnite/when-will-the-fortnite-servers-come-back-online-after-the-chapter-6-season-4-downtime/articleshow/123157576.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/esports/fortnite/when-will-the-fortnite-servers-come-back-online-after-the-chapter-6-season-4-downtime/articleshow/123157576.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 11:27:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2101273" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123157649,imgsize-2101273.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Starship flight to Mars crewed by Optimus in Nov/Dec next year’: Elon Musk</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk has adjusted SpaceX's Mars mission timeline, pushing back the potential Starship launch to 2028 for an uncrewed flight and 2030 for a crewed mission. Technical challenges, including Starship failures and delays in mastering in-space propellant refuelling, have contributed to this shift.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/elon-musk-has-made-an-announcement-starship-flight-to-mars-crewed-by-optimus-in-nov/dec-next-year/articleshow/123164458.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/elon-musk-has-made-an-announcement-starship-flight-to-mars-crewed-by-optimus-in-nov/dec-next-year/articleshow/123164458.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:45:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15064" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123164687,imgsize-15064.cms"/></item><item><title>2025 NFL preseason schedule: Where to watch, teams, weeks, dates, times</title><description><![CDATA[NFL enthusiasts are eagerly awaiting the 2025 season, with the preseason games acting as a thrilling prelude. The Philadelphia Eagles, fresh off their Super Bowl LIX victory, will clash with the Dallas Cowboys on September 4, marking the season's official kickoff.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/2025-nfl-preseason-schedule-where-to-watch-teams-weeks-dates-timeswith-2024-nfl-season-record/articleshow/123161302.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/2025-nfl-preseason-schedule-where-to-watch-teams-weeks-dates-timeswith-2024-nfl-season-record/articleshow/123161302.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1024803" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123162390,imgsize-1024803.cms"/></item><item><title>'Who is at fault?': Tejashwi turns the tables on EC over EPIC row</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/who-is-at-fault-rjd-leader-tejashwi-yadav-takes-on-ec-over-two-epic-numbers-will-give-good-answer-to-it/articleshow/123163276.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/who-is-at-fault-rjd-leader-tejashwi-yadav-takes-on-ec-over-two-epic-numbers-will-give-good-answer-to-it/articleshow/123163276.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 15:36:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49120" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123163945,imgsize-49120.cms"/></item><item><title>Trade war: Trump's 'reciprocal' tariffs go into effect today - check full list of countries</title><description><![CDATA[US President Trump's new tariffs, effective Thursday, impose higher duties on exports from over 60 countries, including India. Brazil also faces a 50% tariff, while others like Canada and the UK have varying rates.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trade-war-donald-trumps-reciprocal-tariffs-go-into-effect-on-dozens-of-countries-today-check-full-list/articleshow/123163986.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trade-war-donald-trumps-reciprocal-tariffs-go-into-effect-on-dozens-of-countries-today-check-full-list/articleshow/123163986.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 15:55:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45980" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123164391,imgsize-45980.cms"/></item><item><title>EXPOSED! Sports Minister V. Abdurahiman's Spain trip, costing Rs 13 lakh, contradicts earlier assurances that no public funds would be used for the invitation. Despite the minister's efforts and Argentina's popularity in Kerala, the visit is now unlikely due to scheduling issues.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/exposed-kerala-government-spent-rs-13-lakh-to-invite-lionel-messi-now-hes-not-coming/articleshow/123163280.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/exposed-kerala-government-spent-rs-13-lakh-to-invite-lionel-messi-now-hes-not-coming/articleshow/123163280.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 15:21:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="88700" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123163630,imgsize-88700.cms"/></item><item><title>Odisha student immolates self after threats from ex — 4th such case</title><description><![CDATA[In Kendrapada, a college student allegedly died by suicide. Her former boyfriend threatened to release private photos. The father blames police inaction. He claims the police did not file a complaint earlier. Instead, they advised blocking the number. An investigation is underway. Police assure accountability if negligence is found. Opposition parties demand immediate arrest.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhubaneswar/girl-sets-self-ablaze-dad-blames-cop-inaction-against-ex-bf-for-her-death/articleshow/123148142.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhubaneswar/girl-sets-self-ablaze-dad-blames-cop-inaction-against-ex-bf-for-her-death/articleshow/123148142.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 04:05:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ASHIS SENAPATI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="840094" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154000,imgsize-840094.cms"/></item><item><title>'Unzipped his pants': Gurgaon woman recounts horror while waiting for cab</title><description><![CDATA[A Gurgaon woman has filed a police complaint alleging sexual harassment near Rajiv Chowk. The police initially refused to register her complaint online, and the women's helpline went unanswered.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/harassed-while-waiting-for-cab-says-woman-goes-to-police-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123149711.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/harassed-while-waiting-for-cab-says-woman-goes-to-police-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123149711.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:05:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAMAD HOQUE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45806" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154751,imgsize-45806.cms"/></item><item><title>Save the date! This marks their return to international cricket after retiring from Test matches. The first match will be in Perth on October 19. Subsequent matches are scheduled for Adelaide and Sydney.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/save-the-date-virat-kohli-and-rohit-sharma-to-make-india-comeback-on-this-day/articleshow/123162772.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/save-the-date-virat-kohli-and-rohit-sharma-to-make-india-comeback-on-this-day/articleshow/123162772.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 14:45:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="172646" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123162826,imgsize-172646.cms"/></item><item><title>Duleep Trophy: After impressive captaincy debut in England, Gill to lead NZ</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill, fresh off his impressive captaincy in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, is set to lead North Zone in the upcoming Duleep Trophy, commencing August 28 in Bengaluru. Gill's stellar performance against England included amassing 754 runs, surpassing Gavaskar's record for most runs by an Indian captain in a five-Test series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/after-impressive-captaincy-debut-in-england-shubman-gill-to-lead-north-zone-in-duleep-trophy/articleshow/123163835.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/after-impressive-captaincy-debut-in-england-shubman-gill-to-lead-north-zone-in-duleep-trophy/articleshow/123163835.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 15:30:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="142222" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123163832,imgsize-142222.cms"/></item><item><title>Indian startup builds world’s largest single-piece 3D-printed Inconel rocket engine</title><description><![CDATA[Indian space startup Agnikul Cosmos achieves a milestone. They build the world's largest single-piece 3D-printed rocket engine. The engine is made from Inconel. Agnikul also secures a US patent for its design and manufacturing process. This innovation reduces production time and complexity. It strengthens India's position in the global space technology sector.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/indian-space-startup-agnikul-builds-worlds-largest-single-piece-3d-printed-inconel-rocket-engine-granted-a-patent-in-us/articleshow/123163895.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/indian-space-startup-agnikul-builds-worlds-largest-single-piece-3d-printed-inconel-rocket-engine-granted-a-patent-in-us/articleshow/123163895.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 15:40:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17292" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123164023,imgsize-17292.cms"/></item><item><title>Proud mum Tanuja whistles at awards show on daughter Kajol’s request</title><description><![CDATA[Veteran actress Tanuja, at 81, captivated the Maharashtra State Film Awards by whistling at Kajol's request, earning praise from Anupam Kher for her youthful spirit. She was recently seen in 'Sarzameen' and will be co-hosting 'Two Much with Kajol and Twinkle'.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/proud-mum-tanuja-whistles-at-awards-show-on-daughter-kajols-request-anupam-kher-calls-her-a-great-mother-and-coolest-heroine-watch/articleshow/123158484.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/proud-mum-tanuja-whistles-at-awards-show-on-daughter-kajols-request-anupam-kher-calls-her-a-great-mother-and-coolest-heroine-watch/articleshow/123158484.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 12:06:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49260" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123158475,imgsize-49260.cms"/></item><item><title>Former Giants star Dave Gallagher passes away at 73 after leaving NFL to become a surgeon</title><description><![CDATA[Dave Gallagher, a former NFL player for the New York Giants who transitioned to a career as an orthopedic surgeon, has passed away at 73. A service honoring his life will be held on August 19th.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/former-giants-star-dave-gallagher-passes-away-at-73-after-leaving-nfl-to-become-a-surgeon/articleshow/123163773.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/former-giants-star-dave-gallagher-passes-away-at-73-after-leaving-nfl-to-become-a-surgeon/articleshow/123163773.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 15:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1080133" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123163728,imgsize-1080133.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump’s 50% tariff on India: How are ‘secondary tariffs’ different from ‘secondary sanctions’?</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump has announced a 25% 'secondary tariff' on Indian goods, effective August 27, to penalize India's oil purchases from Russia. The US tracks oil tanker movements via satellite to monitor countries buying Russian oil.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-additional-tariff-on-india-what-are-secondary-tariffs-and-how-do-they-differ-from-secondary-sanctions-explained/articleshow/123161198.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-additional-tariff-on-india-what-are-secondary-tariffs-and-how-do-they-differ-from-secondary-sanctions-explained/articleshow/123161198.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 13:48:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38246" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123161610,imgsize-38246.cms"/></item><item><title>'If India doesn’t matter to them ...': Tharoor calls for 50% tariff on US</title><description><![CDATA[Speaking about the potential impact of 50 per cent US tariffs, Tharoor remarked, "It will have an impact because we have trade of about $90 billion. If things get costly by 50 per cent, then people will also think before purchasing them. If our competitors, Vietnam, Indonesia, Pakistan, Bangladesh, China, will sell products at a lower cost... it will have an impact.​​​​"]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-india-doesnt-matter-to-them-shashi-tharoor-calls-for-50-tariff-on-us-asks-why-stop-at-17/articleshow/123160578.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/if-india-doesnt-matter-to-them-shashi-tharoor-calls-for-50-tariff-on-us-asks-why-stop-at-17/articleshow/123160578.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, Police Commissioner A Saravana Sundar has ordered an investigation and departmental action.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/coimbatore/coimbatore-shocker-chased-by-25-men-60-year-old-found-dead-at-police-station-entered-to-seek-protection/articleshow/123154801.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/coimbatore/coimbatore-shocker-chased-by-25-men-60-year-old-found-dead-at-police-station-entered-to-seek-protection/articleshow/123154801.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 08:40:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34796" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154824,imgsize-34796.cms"/></item><item><title>'Anyone would do a better job': Trump's 'no talent' dig at Jimmy Fallon, Kimmel</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump asserted that late-night hosts Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Kimmel, and Jimmy Fallon lack talent and predicted their shows' cancellation.       <description><![CDATA[Glenmark USA is named in multiple class actions and direct-action suits, brought by direct purchasers, end-payers, indirect purchasers, and private plaintiffs. The cases allege both drug-specific conspiracies and a broader conspiracy involving multiple generic drug manufacturers.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/access/long-term-bets/why-colgates-global-ceo-is-not-pleased-with-india-19648029.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The company is now revising its pricing plans to target the bottom of India’s socio-economic pyramid. “We had completed work on the ₹20 part of our business, but the Rs 10 entry price point wasn’t addressed, and we’re addressing that as we speak.
